div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2385 Glanum (mod. St.-Rémy-de-Pro- vence), 20 km. S of Avignon, 1955 Burial: c. 50 B.C. Contents: 46 AR, 75 AE. From excavations Massalia: 4 dr. 42 fr. 71 AE Gallic: 4 AE (or potin) Disposition: St.-Rémy-de-Provence Rolland, RN 1956, pp. 89-99
